name: Simeon
text:
Sparking young minds into the wonderful world of science!
Sci-Quest makes science fun for people young and old, with interactive experiments and great exhibits. The friendly staff are always there to help.
When I was young, I always loved to see what was new every visit. From growing DNA and making it visible to dissecting snakes.  Sci-Quest brings it all!

name: Fordtrck302
text: While not all together bad, a good amount of the exhibits did not function either all together or were partially broke. From the looks this has been a long standing problem. For the price their asking I wouldn't go again.

name: Jason Tynes
text: Very good overall. Some broken exhibits but young kids love it! Hopefully it's better when they move from Calhoun community college.

name: Shawn Danielle FitzPatrick
text: Great idea but horrible execution. Most of the exhibits are not working or missing parts. My children enjoyed it but pretty sure they could of had as much fun playing at mcdonalds for free.

name: Justin Prater
text: A very very cool attraction for younger kids and they have fun summer camps. But they never really add any new exhibits

name: a Google User
text: It amazes me Sciquest can get people to pay for their museum. It is okay. Nothing great. It is WAAAAYYY overpriced for what it is. Exhibits feel grubby and half of them don't function correctly. Next time I'll save my money.

name: Michael Vollmer
text: Great place but 25% of the exhibits are broken. My kids still love it.

name: Scott Harden
text: My daughter loved her visit to Sci-Quest!
